name: TXP_CPRA_AUD
description: The audit trail for the calculated panel reactive antibody (CPRA) score of a patient.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode of care record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CPRA_AUDIT
columns.description: Calculated Panel Reactive Antibodies (CPRA) value for entry in audit trail.

columns.name: CPRA_DATE_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Effective date for corresponding Calculated Panel Reactive Antibodies (CPRA) in audit trail.

columns.name: CPRA_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The updating user for the corresponding audit trail entry.

columns.name: CPRA_UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CPRA_UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the corresponding audit trail entry occurred.

columns.name: CPRA_AUDIT_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of audit event that occurred.
